titles.title: Social Security Disability Insurance and Unemployment Benefits Double Dip Elimination Act
Social Security Disability Insurance and Unemployment Benefits Double Dip Elimination Act
To amend title II of the Social Security Act to prevent concurrent receipt of unemployment benefits and Social Security disability insurance, and for other purposes.
Social Security Disability Insurance and Unemployment Benefits Double Dip Elimination Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Social Security.

bill.summary:
Social Security Disability Insurance and Unemployment Benefits Double Dip Elimination Act
This bill amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to disqualify an individual from receiving disability insurance benefits with respect to any month for which the individual receives unemployment insurance benefits.
